oscillationAmplitude._instruction: Enter the oscillation amplitude of the blade from the slicing device during its use.

sliceThickness._instruction: Enter the defined slice thickness during the use of this slicing device.

slicingAngle._instruction: Enter all slicing angles (intentional or unintentional) in relation to the slicing plane used during this activity.

slicingPlane._instruction: Add the anatomical plane that best describes the slicing direction of the tissue sample(s) during the use of this slicing device.

slicingSpeed._instruction: Enter the defined slicing speed during the use of this slicing device.

vibrationFrequency._instruction: Enter the defined vibration frequency during the use of this slicing device.
